name: International Undergraduate
description: Overseas bachelor’s students developing foundational academic knowledge while navigating cultural, financial, and visa-related challenges.

name: International Postgraduate
description: International students enrolled in advanced coursework or research programmes who bring specialised academic backgrounds and global perspectives.

name: International Recruitment Agent
description: External representatives contracted to promote the institution abroad, guide prospective students through applications, advise on visas, and facilitate compliant enrolment pipelines.

name: International Sponsor Organisation
description: Organisations such as governments, NGOs, or employers funding international students’ tuition or living expenses, and requiring compliance and reporting from the institution.

name: International Admissions Staff
description: Professional staff overseeing the application, assessment, and enrolment of international students, ensuring compliance with immigration regulations and institutional policies.

name: Systems Administration Staff
description: IT professionals responsible for maintaining institutional systems and infrastructure, ensuring secure, reliable, and scalable platforms for teaching, learning, and administration.
